definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Happy baccarat is a classic casino game.
sentences.chinese: 開心百家樂是經典賭場遊戲。

sentences.english: In the sophisticated game of Baccarat it's you against the House.
sentences.chinese: 在複雜的遊戲百家樂這是你的家。

sentences.english: If he picks one the game is as a traditional baccarat game.
sentences.chinese: 如果他挑選一個遊戲是作爲傳統百家樂遊戲。

sentences.english: Baccarat has a very low house edge.
sentences.chinese: 百家樂有一個非常低的賭場優勢。

sentences.english: I strike chicken to outshine the group of the guys.
sentences.chinese: 誰有好的百家樂羣我吹雞打你班友。

sentences.english: Play online baccarat game in the comfort of your own home.
sentences.chinese: 在線遊戲百家樂發揮自己舒適的家。

definition: to lend money (for interest)/to give credit
(computing) transcoding/to convert (from one encoding to another)
